| History                 = The Action News television channel covered the Senate hearing of the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]], who were accused by [[Henry Gyrich (Earth-616)|Henry Gyrich]] of endangering the public safety and wanted the group shutdown permanently.{{r|Avengers Vol 1 190}}

Action News reporters covered the execution of [[Hector Bautista (Earth-616)|Hector Bautista]] before the [[Huntsville Unit|Texas State Penitentiary at Huntsville]].{{r|Infinity Wars: Infinity Vol 1 1}}
